law.text: This chapter shall be known and may be cited as the Boiler and Pressure Vessel Safety Act, and, except as otherwise provided herein, shall apply to all boilers and pressure vessels.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 1, par. 1.
